item.title: APSB21-107: APSB21-107: Security update available for Adobe InDesign
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates. More details in the security bulletin.
Products: Adobe InDesign Severity: Important
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/indesign/apsb21-107.html
